Directives > ui-tooltip

ui-tooltip

Top placement

Top 

<ui-button size="small" ui-tooltip ui-tooltip-content="I'm on top!" ui-tooltip-side="top">Top</ui-button>

Bottom placement

Bottom 

<ui-button size="small" ui-tooltip ui-tooltip-content="I'm on the bottom!" ui-tooltip-side="bottom">Bottom</ui-button>

Left placement

Left 

<ui-button size="small" ui-tooltip ui-tooltip-content="I'm on the left!" ui-tooltip-side="left">Left</ui-button>

Right placement

Right 

<ui-button size="small" 
           ui-tooltip 
           ui-tooltip-class="ui-tooltip-white" 
           ui-tooltip-content="I'm on the right!" 
           ui-tooltip-side="right">
    Right
</ui-button>

Top placement with title

Top with title 

<ui-button size="small" 
           ui-tooltip 
           ui-tooltip-title="I'm a title" 
           ui-tooltip-content="I've got a title!" 
           ui-tooltip-side="top">
    Top with title
</ui-button>

Options

Name type description
ui-tooltip expression Expression that should be used to set up a tooltip.
ui-tooltip-content string The content of the tooltip.
ui-tooltip-side string The tooltip placement. Can be top, bottom, right or left.
ui-tooltip-title string The title of the tooltip
ui-tooltip-class string The CSS class name to be used for the tooltip.
